TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 295,000 to 308,000 head versus 305,000 week ago and 308,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 128,000 to 132,000 head versus 130,000 week ago and 126,000 a year ago. Reuter
